item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The show is at 7:35. Let's meet in front of the theater (outside). Hopefully I'll have the discount card by then... Stay tuned for more info on that one!

Please RSVP if you haven't already. Feel free to bring friends -- but be sure to include them in your RSVP if they can come.


OLD STUFF:
In the season of blockbuster movies (Narnia, Indy Jones), I thought I'd throw a comedy in the mix. Let's go see something light-hearted!

Forgetting Sarah Marshall is going to be wicked funny. It's made by the guys from 40-Year-Old Virgin and Knocked Up and stars Jason Segel, from How I Met Your Mother (which I looove).

I'll be there with my husband, Paul. He's tall and blond, so if you don't see me and my long blond hair, you'll most certainly see him.

Let's pick the show that begins between 7:00 and 8:00. I'll update when the date gets closer as to the precise time (let's plan to show up about 15 minutes before the movie starts).

We'll buy tickets together, since I should have my discount card by then. Tickets will be $8.50 for FMM members and guests.

Feel free to bring kids, teens, friends, spouses, loved ones, liked ones, etc. Just remember to include them in your RSVP so I know who to expect.

As usual, name tags will be available so that we can get to know each other. We'll head out to TGI Friday's after the movie, if people are interested, to discuss/socialize.

Hope to see you next Sunday! Have a great week, everyone!

--Dana
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting outside the theater with my meetup name tag on.
item.why: (This is a nugget for those of you who didn't want to wait another week for a movie meetup!)
item.name: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
